title: LINE app : quarterly revenue 2012 to 2015
summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in billion yen in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '15 has the highest Revenue in billion yen and Q4 '12 has the lowest Revenue in billion yen.
The highest value at Quarter Q4 '15 is 13.64x times more than the lowest value at Q4 '12.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion yen for 13 number of Quarters.
The maximum Revenue in billion yen 30.0 is found at Quarter Q4 '15 and the minimum is found at Q4 '12 where Revenue in billion yen is 2.2.

max_summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in billion yen in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Revenue in billion yen is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '15 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '12.
